content.rendered:
Between Canada and U.S., Domestic flights within Canada

Baggage fees, maximum weight and number of bags allowed

CLUB CLASS 
FIRST BAGGAGE   25 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   25 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   25 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – FLIGHT ONLY
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, $35   23 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – FLIGHT ONLY
FIRST BAGGAGE 23 kg, $25 23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 23 kg, $35 23 kg, $35
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 23 kg, $200 23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   28 kg, Included
(Includes voucher for extra 5 kg allowed)
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, $35   23 kg, $35
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

*Additional baggage is subject to space availability.

 

More details about checked baggage
DIMENSIONS Length + width + height must not exceed 158 cm (62 in)
EXCESS BAGGAGE A $75* fee will apply on each piece of checked baggage exceeding the maximum weight allowed. 

*USD: $75 / EUR: €60 / GBP: £49 / CHF:75 / HRK: 390 / HUF: 16500 / CZK: 1500

 

Between Canada and South destinations

Baggage fees, maximum weight and number of bags allowed

CLUB CLASS 
FIRST BAGGAGE   25 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   25 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   25 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – FLIGHT ONLY
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, $35   23 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – FLIGHT ONLY
FIRST BAGGAGE 23 kg, $25 23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 23 kg, $35 23 kg, $35
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 23 kg, $200 23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   28 kg, Included
(Includes voucher for extra 5 kg allowed)
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, $35   23 kg, $35
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

EXCEPTIONS HAITI – FLIGHT ONLY AND TRANSAT PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE 25 kg, Included 25 kg, Included 25 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 25 kg, Included 25 kg, Included 25 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 25 kg, $200 25 kg, $200 25 kg, $200

 

EXCEPTIONS CUBA – FLIGHT ONLY, TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES**
FIRST BAGGAGE 23 kg, Included 23 kg, Included 25 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 23 kg, $35 23 kg, Included 25 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 23 kg, $200 23 kg, $200 25 kg, $200

 

*Additional baggage is subject to space availability.
** Cuba Cruises: 28 kg allowed for the first baggage

More details about checked baggage
DIMENSIONS Length + width + height must not exceed 158 cm (62 in)
EXCESS BAGGAGE A $75* fee will apply on each piece of checked baggage exceeding the maximum weight allowed. 

If any piece weighs more than 32 kg, contact our Cargo department for details at least 72 hours prior to departure. Air Transat reserves the right to limit or refuse excess baggage for operational reasons.
For passengers flying to/from Haiti, additional baggage and/or excess weight is subject to space availability and may be refused for operational reasons.

*USD: $75 / EUR: €60 / GBP: £49 / CHF:75 / HRK: 390 / HUF: 16500 / CZK: 1500

 

 Between Canada and Europe

Baggage fees, maximum weight and number of bags allowed

CLUB CLASS 
FIRST BAGGAGE   32 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   32 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   32 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – FLIGHT ONLY, TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   23 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – FLIGHT ONLY
FIRST BAGGAGE 23 kg, Included 23 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 23 kg, $100 23 kg, $100
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 23 kg, $200 23 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – TRANSAT PACKAGES AND TRANSAT CRUISE PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   23 kg, Included   28 kg, Included
(Includes voucher for extra 5 kg allowed)
SECOND BAGGAGE   23 kg, $100   23 kg, $100
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   23 kg, $200   23 kg, $200

 

*Additional baggage is subject to space availability.

More details about checked baggage
DIMENSIONS Length + width + height must not exceed 158 cm (62 in)
EXCESS BAGGAGE A $75* fee will apply on each piece of checked baggage exceeding the maximum weight allowed. 

*USD: $75 / EUR: €60 / GBP: £49 / CHF:75 / HRK: 390 / HUF: 16500 / CZK: 1500

 

Baggage fees, maximum weight and number of bags allowed

CLUB CLASS 
FIRST BAGGAGE   32 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   32 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   32 kg, $200

 

OPTION PLUS – FLIGHT ONLY AND TRANSAT PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE   30 kg, Included   30 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE   30 kg, Included   30 kg, Included
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)*   30 kg, $200   30 kg, $200

 

ECONOMY CLASS – FLIGHT ONLY AND TRANSAT PACKAGES
FIRST BAGGAGE 30 kg, Included 30 kg, Included
SECOND BAGGAGE 30 kg, $100 30 kg, $100
ADDITIONAL BAGGAGE (EACH)* 30 kg, $200 30 kg, $200

 

*Additional baggage is subject to space availability.

 

More details about checked baggage
DIMENSIONS Length + width + height must not exceed 158 cm (62 in)
EXCESS BAGGAGE A $75* fee will apply on each piece of checked baggage exceeding the maximum weight allowed. 

*USD: $75 / EUR: €60 / GBP: £49 / CHF:75 / HRK: 390 / HUF: 16500 / CZK: 1500

 

Between Canada and Middle East

 

Baggage weight allowed according to the class.

  ECONOMY CLASS OPTION PLUS CLUB CLASS
WEIGHT 10 kg (22 lb) 10 kg (22 lb) 15 kg (33 lb)

 

Carry-on

QUANTITY 1 bag per person. Camera bags, laptops and purses are also permitted.
DIMENSIONS 23 x 40 x 51 cm

(9 x 16 x 20 in) (including wheels and handles)
COST Free
EXCESS BAGGAGE CHARGES, PAYABLE AT AIR TRANSAT CHECK-IN COUNTER. Any carry-on bag that exceeds the above weight or size cannot be carried on an

 

 

For more details visit : http://www.air transat.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information
